website_summaries.verdict: The Nike Revolution 4 received overwhelmingly positive reviews from shoe enthusiasts everywhere. This road-companion was loved for its appealing aesthetics, flexible underfoot experience, and well-ventilated upper. The price was also praised as it didn’t break the bank. On the other hand, there were a few complaints about the durability of the upper. Furthermore, a tight-fitting front section turned off some consumers as others lamented a not-so-accurate-from-the-pictures color scheme.
pros: People were happy that the price for a pair of the Nike Revolution 4 was affordable
A lot of consumers liked the cool design of the Nike Revolution 4, stating that pleasing to the eyes
Several testers welcomed the availability of wide widths, with some praising the ability to choose became accommodating
Most of those who have tested this neutral shoe agreed that the sizing scheme followed their expectations
The underfoot platform suitably flexed with each step, according to many runners
The upper unit kept the foot ventilated, based on a slew of reviews
Several people sometimes wore this running shoe without socks, and they reported no instance of hot spots or skin irritation
The variety of color schemes was lauded by consumers
they welcomed the vibrant hues and the option to choose from many alternatives
Consumers liked the lightweight nature of the Nike Revolution 4’s materials
they didn’t feel weighed down by platform or the upper
cons: The sides of the shoe’s upper developed a hole after only a few uses, several testers claimed
A few purchasers observed that the forefoot section was a bit tight
A couple of people stated that the colors of the product that they received didn’t match the visual representation in the web pages

customer_reviews.title: Nice, breathable shoes for ultra comfort.
customer_reviews.text: Comfy Shoes. I bought them for daily wear and I trust these will serve me well.
customer_reviews.author: Parth Sane

customer_reviews.title: Decent running shoe
customer_reviews.text: I think these shoes should have cost about $35 rather than $50. They fit a bit snug and they're heavier than a lot of the other running shoes I've bought. Two things I that really bothered me were: 1) The design of the bottom of the shoe. Now only do I think the design is awful, but it feels like the front of your feet is way too high off the ground. 2) The squeaking of the shoe. The shoe seems to be squeaking every time I take a step. I thought it was a new shoe problem, but it's still there after wearing it intensively for a week.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: These Nike's Are Not Durable
customer_reviews.text: This product is vastly inferior and doesn't represent the Nike Name, as I previously knew it!! 1. I bought a size larger than I normally wear - it's still too small. If I wear them longer than an hour - I get blisters on the toes of both feet, and 2. Both soles have separated from the bottom of the sneaks. This is pure junk, and Amazon says too late to return. George H. Lutz
customer_reviews.author: George H. Lutz

customer_reviews.title: Your Feet will Thank You!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are great running shoes. Nike is tops in my book when it comes to athletic performance shoes and fit. Their wide sizes are perfect for me and they feel great on my foot as I run on the treadmill or outdoors. Please expand your wide sizes with the various color options.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Very nice running shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice running shoes! I usually run my 10K every Sunday and my previous running shoes were a mess. So I got this pair (about 2 months ago) relying solely on Amazon reviews. And oh wow. People are correct. Very light and comfortable shoes! I might get a second pair. PS. One thing I haven't tested yet is how they will perform when it's raining/wet. The top of the shoe itself is not waterproof, so obviously you can't expect it to be your wading boots. But still, I'm yet to see how quickly my feet will get wet when I run in the rain ...
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: i wear a size 13 croc i bought size 14
customer_reviews.text: i work at a grocery store and am walking constantly on concrete. are these the end all be all? no. are these definitely worth 50$ and also work well for running? yes and yes. i used to wear the croc playa for work and these have not been a dissappointment (once broke in). i use a pair of hofa one one clifton 5's for running and cannot wait to turn them into my next work shoes (but 125$)
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan F.

customer_reviews.title: You get what your pay for...
customer_reviews.text: What can you expect for $60 MSRP? A sturdy shoe. But I must say compared to the pictures, in real life they are very dorky looking - even in all black, and that's saying something. Also the soles are slippery when wet. That said, not really a bad running shoe to train. Ample heal protection, but little road feel and a little tight up front. Update: Still funny looking shoes. Also, giving me more blisters up front on the toes than any other running shoe I've had.
customer_reviews.author: Brusier

customer_reviews.title: Bad Size 16 shoe
customer_reviews.text: Sent the first pair back for a defect because they started squeaking after two weeks. I received my replacement promptly and had no issues. These are really comfortable shoes for a man with big feet. Mine were size 16 HAD TO UPDATE AFTER 5 months. The soles are coming loose, the sides have blown out, and the insides are falling apart. I no longer recommend these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: adam

customer_reviews.title: These are fikes! FAKE NIKE!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are not real Nike!!!! The are cheap knockoffs!!! Do not buy!!!
customer_reviews.author: Bryant Albey

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe great fit
customer_reviews.text: Can be beat for the price and they fit perfectly. Well built and provide great support. Tried cheap knockoffs and got back pains. Changed to these and within a week pains are gone. Buying another asap.
customer_reviews.author: beanegrady

customer_reviews.title: FAST delivery, Great Value, Perfection.
customer_reviews.text: For some unknown the time to ship and delivery is a couple of weeks. MY SHOES WERE DELIVERED IN THREE DAYS. Promised: "Estimated Delivery Date:August 23, 2018-August 27, 2018 2 days remaining on estimated arrival." My, I've worn them a week already. I had Nikes before and bought the same size. Once again they fit perfectly and look great. It was nice to purchase online. No driving to store, fighting traffic, and being in a throng of others looking for shoes when the sales staff is totally engaged with others. They never have my size out front and have to trek to the back room. A true bargain, and, no sales tax.
customer_reviews.author: Bob M

customer_reviews.title: Does not hold up
customer_reviews.text: The color and size were perfect, but I just recently gave these to my husband as a gift and he wore them only 3 times and they are totally destroyed! He plays Volleyball and this is the first time ever that his sneakers did not hold up. Makes me really sad, I collect Nike sneakers and these feel fake to me. I don't recommend these, unless you will use them for driving.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Jara

customer_reviews.title: Extremely comfortable. One of the softest "ride" ever
customer_reviews.text: Fit as expected , Extremely comfortable . One of the softest ride ever . Its like Im walking on clouds. However they lasted only 9 months ...
customer_reviews.author: Sandriego

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my wide feet!
customer_reviews.text: My feet are 3-4E wide and typically wide sneakers are ugly and clumpy. After coming across these by accident and purchasing a pair at a local shoe outlet, I'm totally satisfied with its look and comfort. I bought another pair from Amazon for a better deal and installed Golfkicks on my original pair to use them for golfing because wide golf shoes are ugly.
customer_reviews.author: Local 808

customer_reviews.title: Small, uncomfortable and felt like cheap knockoffs
customer_reviews.text: Right off the bat it didn't seem right....Didn't even arrive in a Nike box, have paper wrapping or anything, just tossed in a small universal box. The shoes themselves were small compared to every other size 15 Nike I've worn and terribly uncomfortable just walking around the house a couple minutes. I could be wrong but they felt and looked like a cheap knockoff product. Very displeased with my purchase and returned them.
customer_reviews.author: jason p.

customer_reviews.title: Not enough support nor cushioning
customer_reviews.text: Not as happy with this pair as I was the first. Seems to lack support and cushioning. While the fabric should be breathable for some reason my son’s feet don’t breath in these shoes and for the first time ever he experienced foot odor. Had to wash the shoes after just a week of wearing and still he complained of sweaty feet and I could smell his feet at the end of the day. Won’t buy this style again.
customer_reviews.author: Sim Coffman

customer_reviews.title: Bad Choice!
customer_reviews.text: I am updating this review and downgrading my previous rating. I replaced a pair of great Nike walking shoes with these less expensive "running" shoes. These shoes do not fit the Nike standard. They lack critical comfort essential to any walker's needs. Plus, now that I have had a few miles in them, they annoyingly squeak while walking on pavement. I don't believe it is the tread but rather a soul separation indicating poor construction. These are junk and nowhere near the Nike price tag they are labelled with. I would not recommend these Nike shoes to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly Comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: This is the THIRD pair of these I've bought for people. Myself, my teenage son, and my adult niece. We all rave about them! They are so comfortable! The front of the shoe is a cloth-like and allow for free movement and there is no constriction of your toes, therefore no need to "break-in" the shoes. They are comfortable from day one!
customer_reviews.author: SherBear

customer_reviews.title: I would say about 70 percent as good as Free Run for half the price.
customer_reviews.text: Free Runs are definitely better no question. These seem to be built for drive force compared to maximum comfort. These are the Kapernack shoes to my knowledge. They were originally around the same price if that means anything to you. Not as good but absolutely a better value unless you actually run or have very sensitive feet. Then definitely go with the free runs. Nike has alot of great shoes. Im not saying noonelse does but, i have not found anyone comparable in the same price range. Not reebok,e brand for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony C. Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Highly reccomend
customer_reviews.text: My favorite shoe of all time.... I’ve bought roughly 27 pairs in the last 5 years. Very comfortable, nice looking hold up and wash great too. I work 22 hr shifts on a cement floor at my wedding venue (5000 sq ft) and we wear these with our business pants/uniform and they match our black pants so clients dont even notice we are wearing tenishoes at the formal events. I’m not sure how i would last all day with out the comfort of this shoe. Ill e devastated if they ever stop making this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The only running shoe I wear
customer_reviews.text: This is my third set of revolutions. This is my favorite color so far. When I find something that I like, I stick to it. I use the shoes for mostly street running and they work great. They are breathable and light. If it’s raining or I step in a puddle, the water doesn’t seep in too bad. I would recommend these shoes to anyone. The only downside of the shoes is a personal problem. If you slip the shoes on without untying them, you can wear out the back real fast which leads to cutting up your ankles. So my recommendation is to treat them well and untie them after every use.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon S. Morrill

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied purchase
customer_reviews.text: Looks exactly as advertised, size fits well. It wears comfortably around the ankles from the cushy padding. Feels comfortable to walk in. Minor issues, shoe is on the narrow side at the arches, eyelets are abit small making the shoelaces rather hard to pull. Other than that, its worth its price
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not up to niki standard
customer_reviews.text: I liked my niki sneakers when it came but some reason now the left sneakers started to click at the heel when I run/walk. I am so disappointed now with it. Whenever I walk with anyone, they asked about that clicking sound coming from my sneakers heel. I had bought a size 8 and returned it for a size 9. Now I have to stop wearing and it’s not even a year I have these sneakers, I wish I could have given it 5 stars, bcuz I kinda like the shoe, but with this clicking in Th e heel, I have to give it a 👎🏽
customer_reviews.author: Rich E

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good deal
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good shoe. Definitely worth the price. The tongue can fold over a little inside the shoe or get off center but it’s not a big deal. Not built as well as the Pegasus shoe, but at less than half the price, it’s a great deal. Love the ventilation. Great for those who’s feet may get a little hot or toasty in a more standard shoe. As always with Nike, the sole is close to perfect. If you are running or on your feet for long periods of time, this shoe is the best bang for your buck.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: I like the design but the inside base is flawed
customer_reviews.text: I like the exterior, simple design for this running shoe. I like the lightweight feel. But there's a structure flaw. I had to buy two of the same sizes because I thought it was an individual defect. The left shoe feels great and inside feels flat and smooth. But the right shoe, the inside sole feels a bit bumpy. It gives you a feeling of unevenness. Other than this, I would've given this product a 5-star review.
customer_reviews.author: HT

customer_reviews.title: Triple threat! Good value, looks and quality.
customer_reviews.text: Great great value, super comfy, and great looking. I’ve purchased other low cost Nike’s at the Nordstrom Rack and it seems like the shanks are broken and squeaky, or there is alwayssome other kind of frustrating issue... SQUEAK-squeak-SQUEAK-squeak. Like a kid walking down the darned hallway in elementary school with wet sneakers. (Not very sneaky!) I wouldn’t be running any distance in them but I am actually wearing them for weight training and so far so good...
customer_reviews.author: Chad W

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: These Nikes are better than most far more expensive Nikes I've tried on over the years. VERY comfortable. No blemishes in workmanship (though, they are still brand new so blemishes in design can show themselves after some wear). Love them.
customer_reviews.author: Beerz

customer_reviews.title: Great looking and feeling shoe at the price.
customer_reviews.text: Great looking shoe. Fit perfectly. Very light and the white sole seems to be pretty scuff resistant. Only issue I had was it hurts my heels after long hours but i wouldn’t say it’s a design issue. More personal. Overall great buy and was sale. Update! Talked to another person that bought the same pair and hurts his feet also. (I stand for 10 hours a day in a factory)
customer_reviews.author: Scott121

customer_reviews.title: Great Bang for the Buck
customer_reviews.text: I have worn a size 12 for the last 25 years and didn’t have any issues with sizing. Usually I don’t get wide shoes but Maybe I should have. These feel slightly snug. On long runs I can feel it. It’s been a week but I am expecting it to stretch. The cushion is perfect. Great bang for the buck compared to higher priced running shoes. The look is perfect. Subtle. Matches the cross trainer Nike’s I’ve had for years. Great price for the casual runner
customer_reviews.author: RyeBri

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable Shoes
customer_reviews.text: The shoes arrived in new condition and they feel very comfy on the feet and they look very nice if you keep them clean. They fit true to size. So if you wear a 10.5 like me then get a 10.5. I use these shoes as walking shoes and they have not given me any pain on my feet. I feel like I can use them all day everyday if I needed to.
customer_reviews.author: William aka Trilliam

customer_reviews.title: Not For Me
customer_reviews.text: I found these to lack support, they felt like they did not have any infrastructure. They may be perfect for you so I am not saying "stay away". BUT the thing that really made me return them is they appeared to have been worn prior to my getting them. ( which may have added to my first comments. ) Anyway not for me.
customer_reviews.author: Rit Walker

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, then painful
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased 2 pairs of these shoes and I've encountered the same problem with each pair. They're comfortable for the first few months, but then the plastic within the shoe wrapping around the heel of your foot breaks into pieces over time and if the shoes continue to be worn, will eventually puncture through the fabric, cutting your heels. These are not a great long-term investment, especially if used for working/running.
customer_reviews.author: ALindo

customer_reviews.title: Wrong Labeling. Shoe Box says 4E, which is xW, but the shoes inside is W.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the shoes, 9 xWide. The shoe box I got says 4E, which is xWide. The shoes inside are Wide, which equals to 2E. So I had to return them to get 9-1/2 xWide, knowing I would get 9-1/2 Wide. Manufacturer should have 2E (Wide) and 4E (xWide) matched in shoe box and the shoes inside. Also, I paid $50 for the shoes at Amazon. A day later I got a pair at JC Penny for $40, although, less color choice. I like the shoes, having enough cushion.
customer_reviews.author: Henry Wen

customer_reviews.title: Good shoes
customer_reviews.text: As I have come to expect from Nike, it fits like a glove. An odd thing to expect from a shoe, actually. I can barely feel them on my feet. Of course, I just watched a House marathon, so that may be a symptom of a much deeper problem. But, I digress. When they grace my feet I feel as if I can run for miles. Of course when I give into that feeling, I can usually only make it a few blocks before my gastritis turns my stomach into a churning cauldron of acid. Um, the shoes are great, but I may need a little work.
customer_reviews.author: Neal F Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: Pretty sure these are knock offs
customer_reviews.text: Pretty sure these are fakes. All I wear if I put on running shoes is Nikes and these dont look or feel right. The insole doesn't have a Nike logo like every other pair I've ever owned and the feel once on just isnt the quality I've always had with Nikes. The back inner framework digs into my heel and the whole feel is just off.
customer_reviews.author: Austin

customer_reviews.title: Great seller, awesome shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Super fast shipment. These shoes are awesome, bought them as a gift for my husband. He'll love them, thank you!
customer_reviews.author: ByMara

customer_reviews.title: Insoles are not removeable as was stated.
customer_reviews.text: Shoes have a fixed insole vs removeable like most Nike and other athletic shoes. Returned to seller.
customer_reviews.author: A. Bruckner

customer_reviews.title: Third pair and still my favorite running shoe
customer_reviews.text: This is the 3rd pair of these exact shoes and closing in on the 10th pair of Nike Air Revolution model. They are very comfortable from day 1. The laces last for the life of the shoe and stay tightly tied in all environments and use. I am very happy with this shoe and am contemplating a "bulk" purchase before they are completely gone.
customer_reviews.author: Shane

customer_reviews.title: Good shoes
customer_reviews.text: Boy friend got these for work, the price is great and he loves them. I did spray them with waterproof treatment so he wouldn't get soaked and it worked great! Good deal on good shoes
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Nice Shoes - Need Longer Laces
customer_reviews.text: My son has had about four pairs of these shoes in youth sizes and finally moved up to men's this year. He loves them and won't wear anything else. I give them four stars b/c they need longer shoe laces (the laces are only 43" long, but should be about 54" to give enough slack for proper tying.) I would purchase again, though.
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: Wrong size in box and previously worm
customer_reviews.text: Ordered size 11. Received a 10,5 in a size 11 box. Also the shoes received had been slightly worn and returned obviously.
customer_reviews.author: THLott

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: These are the coolest looking shoes! Sometimes, less is more, is a good way to think of these. The simple design, to me, is what attracts me to them. Super comfortable for walking (I’m 69, so I don’t run), lightweight, and a perfect fit. Great with shorts or slacks. I’d take one in every color if they were giving them away. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Robert W. Whipple

customer_reviews.title: Extremely comfortable... squeak... look and feel great... squeak... breathable.... squeak
customer_reviews.text: every single step these squeak loudly... hoped it would go away after wearing them in a bit, but it never has. annoying and embarrassing to wear out in public if i'm going to be walking with anyone, squeak, squeak, squeak. not sure if this is an isolated manufacturing defect or if my feet just are sweatier or have different pressure points than others, but i can't believe how good this product is reviewed and how disappointed i am with the pair i got.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan C. Luckie

customer_reviews.title: “Magical” shoes
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my husband. It’s hard to find size 15 eeee shoes for a great price. They are so light and comfortable. Hubby is a retired NFL player that beat up his body for 13 pro seasons so his joints need the TLC. Now he’s on the field coaching 7 days a week and said these shoes are magical! No pain after ten hours on the turf.
customer_reviews.author: yoga momma

customer_reviews.title: Happy with these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I like these the best of any Nike running shoes I have ever had. They fit much better than the higher priced Pegasus that I replaced with these. Lightweight, great shoes that feel good on my feet. BTW: I wondered if I needed to go for the wider version but tried the standard size and these are fine. No need for the hassle of returns.
customer_reviews.author: Walt Fitzharris

customer_reviews.title: Great sneakers for the price!
customer_reviews.text: My husband loved these as a birthday gift. I looked at another pair of nikes he has for the size and they fit great. He says they’re super lightweight and comfortable. His feet were hurting in his old sneakers and these have helped. He only wears them leisurely though, not at work.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Light weight  And aesthetically pleasing.
customer_reviews.text: Great pair of shoes. I recieve positive comments every time I wear them. I like them so much that I purchased another pair in a different colored. I have read in other customer reviews that the shoes have an annoying squeaking sound as you wear them. I'm here to tell you that I have NOT had that experience with either pair of the shoes that I purchased. Perhaps it's a weight issue that's causing the squeaking noise..... I'm just saying...I love these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Lane

customer_reviews.title: these are crap!
customer_reviews.text: The top of the shoes are mesh very cheaply woven started to fall apart after the first couple of weeks! Nearly 6 to 9 months later Has multiple holes on top because of very poor stitching! Furthermore I barely wear these things at all only like 2 to 4 a week for only an hour to exercise???
customer_reviews.author: Jessie S

customer_reviews.title: Strange plastic material in show causes discomfort.
customer_reviews.text: This poorly constructed product is a great disappointment. Cheap plastic was used in the heel which somehow was bent and causes discomfort when walking. I have never bought a pair of running shoes with this type of material in it. I recommend going with a different model or brand.
customer_reviews.author: Markus

customer_reviews.title: Great Sneakers!
customer_reviews.text: I normally wear a size 14 but, I took a chance with getting a size 15 and I'm glad I did. The size 15 fits perfectly and a great look to boot. I have grown children who are critical of how I look when I'm in my sports attire and they were extremely impressed. I'm considering purchasing another pair!
customer_reviews.author: Pastor J.L. Spann,Jr

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my husband, who is notorious for wearing through shoes really fast (I’m talking holes, tears, you name it). It’s been 1 year since I got them, with him using them for workouts 2-3 times a week, and they’re still in excellent condition.
customer_reviews.author: Brynn C.

customer_reviews.title: Best workout shoes ever
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing shoes. Lightweight, comfortable and easy to put on. The best part is the way they fit uniformly around your feet! No part seems tight or loose. They wrap around your feet like a gentle hug, yet, already stay put - without the slightest slip.
customer_reviews.author: Setu Garg

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a broke college kid. My boyfriend really needed quality shoes and wouldn't buy them himself. I bought these for him hoping they were the true product at a lower price, like I said broke college kids. And guess what? The were perfect. Perfect fit, perfect color, perfect timing, everything perfect! Despite my skepticism I was very pleased; so much so that I'm getting him another pair this Christmas, arriving Thursday! I highly, highly recommend this product!!
customer_reviews.author: Katelynn Kenyon

customer_reviews.title: Too tight
customer_reviews.text: I liked the way it was put together but it has no to very little give I thought that they would give to relieve the tightness on my left large toe after a week of wearing them but it has not so they just sit in my closet now.
customer_reviews.author: RicK DeVries

customer_reviews.title: This is really good summer shoes.
customer_reviews.text: This is really good summer shoes. That is must have. This not only look good! It actually feels perfect on the feet. I wish all colors are in stock. As of today ( 10/01/2019 ) most colors are out of stock. This is almost ass good as Nike Free Rn Flyknit 2018 Mens.
customer_reviews.author: mr. Y. G.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The glue holding down the insole was defective resulting in bunching up inside the shoe. I used double sided tape and we'll see if it works long term. Also the plasic frame areond the heel dimpled and pressed on the heel making it uncomfortable. I am not sure it this is a manufacturing defect or just cheaply manufactured.
customer_reviews.author: LindaH

customer_reviews.title: Reasonable for my growing boy!
customer_reviews.text: My 14 year old likes the look of these shoes (which says a lot!...and they are comfortable. The sole is not intended for grip, rather smooth. I would say they wear quickly meaning the top mesh frayed within days of wearing them for school. For the price and a growing boy, they are reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my father who needed new shoes. Showed up and the shoes were in perfect condition. Everything looked like the picture and they fit my dad perfectly. It did have some strings coming off of it (two) that I had to cut off though. Besides that great shoe. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Mismatched soles
customer_reviews.text: Super disappointed to learn today my adult sized teen has been wearing these and the sole of the left shoe was cut for a right shoe and the right sole is for a right shoe so they cannot be switched. We will have to buy new shoes as he’s just been dealing. Super bummer.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Good buy but recommend going up half a size as fits tight around toe area
customer_reviews.text: My husband typically wears a 10 but these shoes are a little tight in the toe area. Would recommend purchasing a half size larger to ensure they are a good fit & won't cause ingrown toe nails. Otherwise, it's a good, comfortable shoe and they are nice looking.
customer_reviews.author: Praise LLC & Bo the Good Barber

customer_reviews.title: Runs true to size, could use more support
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my husband. He wanted good running shoes for pavement. These are good, the price can't be beat and they are a great shoe for the price! They could be a little more supportive and have a better sole, but for the price we paid I think they are great.
customer_reviews.author: Super cool Mom of 3

customer_reviews.title: It didn't last 6 months
customer_reviews.text: So I purchased a pair of these nikes on 5 months ago and at first they were perfect until now it seems they are falling apart. i tried to reach out to Amazon to help me find out if there is any type warranty since it hasn't been even 6 months. I was given a phone to reach the seller, sadly I haven't been able to reach the seller.
customer_reviews.author: KJman

customer_reviews.title: Right foot squeaks!
customer_reviews.text: Started to squeak after a week of use. Right foot squeaks off and on now. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: drfrumpy

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Nike has a fairly narrow toe box which fits me very well. These shoes are no exception. They delivered to my door in one day. The price was as good as any including the discount stores. Selection on Amazon is better than most stores. Another great experience.
customer_reviews.author: D. Alberts

customer_reviews.title: Very nice shoe
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my 12 year old son who wore down a previous pair of Nikes. He said these are just as comfortable so we are happy with our purchase. They arrived quickly and were packaged perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Parker

customer_reviews.title: Plastic liner
customer_reviews.text: Terrible shoe, inexpensive but not worth it. Back of the shoe is plastic and if it bends you can’t bend it back. I stepped on the back of my shoe while putting it on and now it digs into my heel. Terrible running shoe. Also they are pretty heavy
customer_reviews.author: Treex3

customer_reviews.title: Not up to Nike standards
customer_reviews.text: Will never buy shoes online again! I purposely bought Nike because they have always had an excellent arch support, these have a soul that is so flexible you can twist this shoe! wore them once, regretted it!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas White

customer_reviews.title: Stiffer but solid
customer_reviews.text: This model is a good basic running/walking sneaker for the money. The sole is very solid. Form-fitting. But if you want more flex and a slightly lighter shoe, go with the Free RN. As many have said, the 2018 model is really good, but expect the soles to wear out quickly.
customer_reviews.author: J. Glick

customer_reviews.title: Nike makes a great shoe
customer_reviews.text: I just received these shoes in a size 10 and they fit perfectly. The support is good and overall a very comfortable pair of shoes. I do a lot of walking at work, so these will make that easier. Very happy customer here :)
customer_reviews.author: HorsesBooksGuitars00

customer_reviews.title: Versatiles shoes; love 'em!
customer_reviews.text: These are versatile shoes. Their flat black appearance makes them suitable for "business casual" wear. They're light & flexible, and I like them fine for running. They are lightweight and well ventilated. Inexpensive, too!
customer_reviews.author: Robert H

customer_reviews.title: Great running shoe
customer_reviews.text: A great comfortable running shoe, no break in they just feel great and my knees get sore now before my feet ever hurt when running lol
customer_reviews.author: S.W.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these in the store for my oldest and found them cheaper here, so I bought another pair for my middle son. These are by far the best shoes. They're lightweight for running and the pads on the bottoms work great for tumblers.
customer_reviews.author: Seaneen Hebert

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: This is a great shoe. I have been struggling with foot pain recently, and this shoe has been very comfortable so far. And for the price it can't beat. It's a step up from the last version a few years ago that I bought. I will definitely be buying these again.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Koichi Mizushima

customer_reviews.title: Comfort
customer_reviews.text: The shoe isnt the most appealing to the eyes. Looks almost like a walmart brand shoe. But, Ive always bought expensive, nice shoes and this is probably the most comfortable pair Ive ever had. They fit absolutely perfect and I can wear them all day without any worry. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Givens

customer_reviews.title: Nike's at a DEAL!
customer_reviews.text: At first, because of the price I was skeptical at purchasing these Nike's but after delivery and trying them on I'm glad I purchased these new kicks! They are 100% legit, comfortable & look good with jeans and shorts! Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Prestige PRIME Shopper

customer_reviews.title: An okay shoe
customer_reviews.text: This is an okay shoe. It’s got a fairly cheap heel material that bubbles and wrinkles after taking off and putting on the shoe a couple times. It doesn’t bother me while I’m wearing them though. I wouldn’t use them too hard either. They’re better for light duty stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: Best value in Nike line!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of this type of Nike sneaker. Very comfortable and I love the look. These are very similar to a pair of Nikes I bought two years ago. My only complaint is that a wide size is not available. I usually wear an 11 1/2 wide so I ordered a 12 and they fit very well.
customer_reviews.author: Jim C.

customer_reviews.title: Super Buy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my dad who is a size 9. They fit just as expected and were incredibly comfortable and gave him the support he needed as he has plantar fasciitis.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia Sotelo

customer_reviews.title: Really nice sneakers .
customer_reviews.text: These are a great looking pair of sneakers. The only negative and it is due to manfactering or any thing is are a wee bit tight because I have to use insoles because of bone spurs . I would definitely buy them again though.
customer_reviews.author: Philip T. Delhagen

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are amazing...
customer_reviews.text: Too bad they don’t fit right. I was too lazy to ship them back so I gave them to a coworker. He tells me how comfortable they are. Thanks Nike for making shoes smaller than industry standard. Come at me.
customer_reviews.author: MushaAleste

customer_reviews.title: Great gym shoe
customer_reviews.text: My favorite pair of shoes for the gym. Lightweight, breathable and comfortable. They’re not great for running and ok for walking best uses is for indoor gym for funcional fitness.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Callahan

customer_reviews.title: Used to be a loyal to Nike.
customer_reviews.text: Shoes are good. Same great Nike quality. But, also bought a pair of Under Armour. I will probably wear those as my primary pair and these as a back up pair. Under Armour is way more comfortable with no foot pain at the end of a long day on my feet. Sorry Nike. I’ve always been loyal.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn L

customer_reviews.title: They fit and wear great
customer_reviews.text: I found these shoes while having foot problem and pain. These shoes have allowed me to work longer hours, to work more years and enjoy walking and hiking in retirement. If you have bunions, order the extra wide.
customer_reviews.author: A. Tyner

customer_reviews.title: Not a running shoe. Wears out in 3 months
customer_reviews.text: Originally gave it 3 stars. After 3 months of usage, the shoe makes a tik tok sound with each step. Tik when pressure is applied, tok when pressure is lifted. Advertised as running shoe but is not. Did not use the shoe for running.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks like a fake nike
customer_reviews.text: Looks like a fake. I wonder if it's not a fake nike?
customer_reviews.author: Benaja

customer_reviews.title: Good shoes
customer_reviews.text: They look slick and all the expected Jazz from these Nike pair but damn are they tight fit! And the top lace kind of hurt my top of the feet, so I had to undo it but still really confortable
customer_reviews.author: Tony A.

customer_reviews.title: Decent for the price
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a 15wide shoe, for my son , but did not receive wide size .Shoes came in a non shoe box, with no tags , I wonder if they may be irregulars or counterfeit , but they fit my son ok ,a little snug since they were not wides , but he kept them .Decent price .
customer_reviews.author: MS1971

customer_reviews.title: Very uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: These are the most uncomfortable shoes I’ve ever owned! I have to wear them very lose almost untied or they give my feet cramps. Never had this issue with shoes before.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Love this shoe!
customer_reviews.text: These are men;s athletic shoes but I am a woman with orthotics, so the extra width up front in perfect. I own these now in 3 different colors.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great price.... Very Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Great price and a really comfortable shoe. I am not sure how well they would hold up as a running shoe but you can wear them all day and night with no issues. Size is right on as well while most Nike products sometimes seem to be cut small.
customer_reviews.author: Captain Eric G

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy.
customer_reviews.text: I swear these are fake! The tongue of the shoe felt like razor blades as the seams were so poorly sewn. Returned!
customer_reviews.author: ALS

customer_reviews.title: Great gym shoe for the money
customer_reviews.text: This sneaker is great for working out. I wear it doing cardio and working out with my trainer. Very breathable, my feet don’t sweat AT ALL in these, and I always sweat working out!
customer_reviews.author: M T

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know if this is a knock off or what but the shoe is falling apart after 1 week. My son is only using in PE class. Going to be returning because they are junk. Not Nike shoes and not worth $50
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great everyday shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes. They fit a bit like the Roshes. Light, but more durable than the Roshes. Awesome light everyday shoe. Probably wouldn't use them to run long distances, as I'm not totally convinced they're durable enough for that. I mix them in on my runs on days where my legs feel a little dead. Well ventilated.
customer_reviews.author: Michael C

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable shoes. Annoyingly squeaky.
customer_reviews.text: Bought theses because I needed a new pair of running shoes. They fit great and were super comfortable. My joy was short lived because as soon as I got up to try them out, they started making an annoying squeaking sound every time I took a step (think Spongebob Squarepants levels of squeak). I was mildly annoyed at first, but figured that the sound would subside after a week or so of regular use. Nope. Every single step I take sounds like I've attached a man in a latex suit to each foot and with each step, he squeaks. Yearning to be released from his pedal prison.
customer_reviews.author: David Cordova

customer_reviews.title: Decent Shoe
customer_reviews.text: It's not a bad shoe, but it is a basic shoe at decent price point. However, I do think you're paying more just for the Nike logo. The shoe fits well and is comfortable for the most part. I do not recommend wearing these shoes in the rain, because they will just become water logged and take days to dry out. I have also found them to be somewhat loud compared to other shoes I've had. I only got these shoes because Nike stopped making the shoes I liked and I ruined those and had to get some new Nikes in a pinch. Not a bad shoe for the price, however they aren't for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice WIDE sneaker for some foot issues
customer_reviews.text: Great all around sneaker for my foot problems. I've had Morton's neuroma in one foot that I have battled for some time now, and these wide sneakers were excellent for providing relief so that I could still go to the gym. I wish they were a little more flat to take even more pressure off of the metatarsals, but I've tried probably 6 different pairs of sneakers and these provide the best overall performance.
customer_reviews.author: J. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Slipper when wet
customer_reviews.text: I’m just an average guy who does some cardio here and there. These shoes are slippery when wet, like really bad. Something to think about. Other than that I like wearing them with blue jeans. I think they look cool.
customer_reviews.author: Steve McCafe

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality and very uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Horrible shoe. Back of the sole comes to a flat edge that results in a broken stride. Foam is hard and uncomfortable standing for even short times. Plastic in the rear is very flimsy, and it will fold and break just putting the shoes on.
customer_reviews.author: Pulsar

customer_reviews.title: Most comfy shoes
customer_reviews.text: Im on my 3rd pair of these all in grey lol My wife hates I never change. I run inserts for my flat feet and boy are these comfortable I walk about 20 miles a week and they hold up for a good 3 months or so. I will say this after what I saw Nike do with the Betty Cross flag I will never buy another Nike product but I had these so that is my review.
customer_reviews.author: Hossein A Sharifi

product_meta.title: Nike Men's Revolution 4 Running Shoe
product_meta.description: Mesh for breathable comfort, soft foam provides lightweight cushioning, flexible grooves along the sole allow the foot to flex naturally, rubber sole for long-lasting stability.
feature_bullets: Soft foam midsole delivers lightweight, responsive cushioning
Underlays in the vamp and toe tip offer support and structure.
Molded pods offer multi-surface traction. Pods flatten on impact then spring back at toe-off creating a piston effect that delivers responsive cushioning.
